    Holds and manages a set of block nodes.

    GraphUniverse.Builder
    A builder for GraphUniverses.

    Interface that allows access to the nodes at given positions.

    Holds and manages all block graphs for a given world.

    Describes a connection between two nodes.

    Context for node entities.
    NodeHolder<N extends BlockNode>
    Positioned holder for a block node.
    SnapshotNode<T extends BlockNode>
    Immutable version of NodeHolder, holding only a node and its position.
